mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_employee WHERE email=#{email} and password=#{password}

-- 姓名 性别 手机号 邮箱 职位 部门 入职日期 状态 select e.name,e.gender,e.phone,e.email,p.position_name,d.dep_name,e.begin_date,e.work_state from tb_employee e ,tb_department d ,tb_position p
e.department_id = d.id and e.position_id = p.id
and e.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')
and p.position_name like concat('%',#{positionName},'%')
and d.dep_name like concat('%',#{depName},'%')
